question.title: When trying to use JPA with eclipse, it automatically disconnects my USB
question.body:
I was trying to clone coding one of the open class on the youtube. It was using JPA, and I was using eclipse.

JPA was occuring a problem; it was continually disconnected my USB which includes the workspace.

Is this a problem of eclipse, or JPA, or some other thing?

Edit from here; I will add some more informations, including I wrote on comment.

FIrst: Error stacktrace

Second: PC info I am currently using Windows 11 home edition. Processor: AMD Ryzen 7 8845HS w/ Radeon 780M Graphics 3.80 GHz, 64bit RAM: 32GB

Third: The code I was following the class of youtube. But was using the default file structure given by String Initializr. While following, it disconnected my USB several times, and still.

Also I forgot this;

The info I gave to spring initializr is this.

Edit again;

Ok, the full log of eclipse errors is on the link; only errors.

List of the logs is here; I think I cannot upload it as text, and I found that I cannot upload the full log. If you need more log, then just specifically tell from the image. Do not tell me as bad attitude because of it; then how can I upload full log or can detect what is relavent without experience?

My USB was disconnected each time after the logs 'Periodic workspace save' failed.

JAVA version is 24, might be this can help.

Also, I should say that my USB never disconnected almost per 30 minutes before using JPA or eclipse.

question_comments.body: Ok, now I uploaded as text as you wanted. As I editted, I cannot upload full log and I cannot detect/or know which log is important. Also I could not find how to upload only list of the logs as text. So, if you need specific log on the list, specify to me. Also, please do not tell as You must do ~ to get answer, not only me, but to all other questioners. That makes questioners depressed. Questioners normally concentrates what they want to know, so just politely ask if they do not give all the information what you want. They just want answer, and do not know what is clue.
You must copy the messages from your screenshots as text to your question. Otherwise nobody is going to take the effort to go through all of this.
Sure, @dan1st. I added the log. I do not think there is anything relevant with my question, though.
Can you open the error log view (Window > Show View > Error Log), look for a relevaentry and copy it into your question?
Also, I was following the course on the link; youtube.com/watch?v=8ZPsZBcue50 I was trying on the basic directory from 'Spring Initializr'.

Ok, I will give you the informations.  I did not use any custom encoding. I am using Windows 11, and was using 'Sandisk 256GB USB'. My notebook is ASUS, using AMD Ryzen 7 8845HS w/ Radeon 780M Graphics   3.80 GHz, 32GB RAM. I think the stacktrack in the image of right one is the full stacktrace.
Please add stacktraces as code. What encoding have you configured? What file are you trying to save where? What is the OS and what is the usb device being disconnected?
